body:
i'm thankful i found the box in the attic that had various mismatched gloves in it and took a handful so that my hands wouldn't be cold on my bike ride to coworking.

i'm thankful that though i accomplished fewer tangible things than usual at coworking, i'm glad i went. i'm thankful i got to get lunch at the food cart pod with my friends, even though i somehow by autopilot got food for a second time from a relatively mediocre thai restaurant. i'm thankful for the key lime gose beer i had at happy hour.

i'm thankful for the fact that the last little stretch of the ride to our house is, from the direction i'm almost coming, very slightly downhill, not so much that you actually start going fast but just enough that there is a kind of gentle inertial gliding that is my favorite bike sensation.

i'm thankful for d's enjoyment at facetiming with h. i'm thankful for h's description of herself as a person that likes foods with multiple textures, which is also a way i'd describe myself. i'm thankful that d made tiramisu.

i'm thankful that _booksmart_ is now on hulu and we watched it last night after dessert and it's so joyful and good. i'm thankful it's saturday.

i'm thankful i did an extended bit of looking at d from the other side of the couch rather than watching the TV, which made her laugh more and more because of my commitment to the bit, more until i had to stop because she couldn't breathe anymore for laughter.
normalized_markdown:
i'm thankful i found the box in the attic that had various mismatched gloves in it and took a handful so that my hands wouldn't be cold on my bike ride to coworking.

i'm thankful that though i accomplished fewer tangible things than usual at coworking, i'm glad i went. i'm thankful i got to get lunch at the food cart pod with my friends, even though i somehow by autopilot got food for a second time from a relatively mediocre thai restaurant. i'm thankful for the key lime gose beer i had at happy hour.

i'm thankful for the fact that the last little stretch of the ride to our house is, from the direction i'm almost coming, very slightly downhill, not so much that you actually start going fast but just enough that there is a kind of gentle inertial gliding that is my favorite bike sensation.

i'm thankful for d's enjoyment at facetiming with h. i'm thankful for h's description of herself as a person that likes foods with multiple textures, which is also a way i'd describe myself. i'm thankful that d made tiramisu.

i'm thankful that _booksmart_ is now on hulu and we watched it last night after dessert and it's so joyful and good. i'm thankful it's saturday.

i'm thankful i did an extended bit of looking at d from the other side of the couch rather than watching the TV, which made her laugh more and more because of my commitment to the bit, more until i had to stop because she couldn't breathe anymore for laughter.
